attributes.title: the worst app EVER
attributes.review: i have never seen something like this before. the music absolutely DESTROYED my ears. I am now deaf in one ear. This app also made me lose battery VERY quickly. As soon as i downloaded i was FLOODED with spam calls and emails. ONE STAR I DONT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Terrible app don't waste your time waiting for this app to download.
attributes.review: This app is terrible, it takes forever to load even though I have great connection.

attributes.title: Never download this app
attributes.review: This app is the worst app on the App Store it made my phone glitch several time it made my phone shut down and it did not let be close the app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and not even in the first minute it started glitching😡😡😡 It made my phone slow down and overall is a horrible app. Will not be supporting him anymore 😡😡😡 I am very mad😡😡😡

attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: I could not believe the millions and millions of fake news on this app. It’s a very bad, horrible app. Just a tremendous HUGE lie. Think about the incredible men and women excuse me no just the white ones that need they’re orange God to worship too.

attributes.title: IF I COULD GIVE IT ZERO STARS I WOULD
attributes.review: This is a horrible app. There are so many bugs, glitches, and it gave my phone a virus. DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU WANT A VIRUS This app took hours to download and it wasted my time. The news is FAKE! This upsets me a lot. The quality is unexceptionable.

attributes.title: Apps is whack
attributes.review: I tried to download and it took 3 whole hours I can’t believe this! I was trying to support for the upcoming election... this app seriously needs some tweaks... better yet REMOVED! I’m disappointed.

attributes.title: I hate it
attributes.review: It never loaded, and i was really really trying to support but it would freeze up and take me back to the home screen. So terrible experience 😂

attributes.title: One star
attributes.review: This app is very bad it’s supper laggy and it has so many bugs that need to be fixed and to add on the events are not even up to date. I would not recommend this add !!!!

attributes.title: Terrible Worst app ever created!!!!
attributes.review: It took a month to install and once it had installed it took my chihuahua and deported it. Not only that the app turned my phone orange and made it scream WALL at me. I have never been so disgusted and will be voting Danny Devito 2020
